org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore

Class DataPersistenceProviderMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.DataPersistenceProviderMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPersistenceProvider

    public class DataPersistenceProviderMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataPersistenceProvider
    This class is intended for testing purposes. It just triggers CountDownLatch's in each method. This class really should be under src/test/java but it was problematic trying to uses it in other projects.

      • isRecoveryApplicable

        public boolean isRecoveryApplicable()
        Specified by:
        isRecoveryApplicable in interface DataPersistenceProvider
        Returns:
        false if recovery is not applicable. In that case the provider is not persistent and may not have anything to be recovered
